title: Textile, 1770–90
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 162 x 76 cm (5 ft. 3 3/4 in. x 29 15/16 in.)
description: An alternation of two different stripes; one an hour-glass shape enclosing a windmill, the other a floral vine. The hour-glass shape in in straight repeat, the floral vine is half-drop. In black, red and blue on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1770–90.Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-222.
